story.title: The Journey
story.content: Every great story begins with a question. Mine was: 'What comes after mathematics?' After earning my Master's in Digital Signal Processing and spending years in the world of numbers, equations, and algorithms, I discovered something magical—the art of turning abstract mathematical concepts into tangible digital experiences. From building 2D game engines to architecting scalable FinTech solutions, from voice recognition systems to machine learning infrastructure, my journey has been about finding order in chaos and uncovering the logic within complex systems. Aftermath Technologies represents not just what comes after mathematics, but how mathematical thinking transforms into technological innovation that changes the world.

about.title: The Mind Behind the Magic
about.content: I'm Samuel Besong, a Principal Software Engineer who thrives on brain-challenging activities and constantly seeks to find order in chaos. With a Master's in Digital Signal Processing and a Bachelor's in Mathematics, I've spent over 8 years transforming complex problems into elegant solutions. From building scalable software architectures at VORI Health to crafting FinTech solutions for Groupe B&T, I've guided teams and led projects that have taken companies from startup dreams to industry leaders. My expertise spans the full technology stack—from TypeScript and Python to AWS and Machine Learning—but what truly drives me is the art of turning abstract mathematical concepts into tangible digital experiences that businesses love and users adore.
